statements: SELECT * FROM TrafficData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, date, location FROM TrafficData WHERE vehicle_type='Car'
SELECT location, vehicle_type, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 60
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE congestion_level = 3 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TrafficData WHERE date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE location='New York' AND speed > 60 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE vehicle_type='Car' AND congestion_level < 3 ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM TrafficData WHERE vehicle_type IN ('Truck', 'Bus') AND congestion_level > 4;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM TrafficData WHERE speed < 40;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE vehicle_type='Motorcycle' AND congestion_level = 1 ORDER BY location ASC, speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, congestion_level FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT suggested_speed, traffic_light_status FROM route_optimization WHERE congestion_prediction = 'high';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data JOIN route_optimization ON traffic_data.vehicle_id = route_optimization.route_id;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY congestion_level ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, congestion_level FROM traffic_data JOIN route_optimization ON traffic_data.timestamp = route_optimization.timestamp WHERE route_id = '1234';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT vehicle_id) AS "Unique Vehicles", AVG(speed) AS "Average Speed" FROM traffic_data GROUP BY congestion_level HAVING congestion_level = 'Heavy';
SELECT route_id, suggested_speed, traffic_light_status FROM route_optimization WHERE congestion_prediction = 'High' ORDER BY suggested_speed DESC, traffic_light_status ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level='High';
SELECT * FROM route_optimization WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT id, vehicle_name, current_location FROM autonomous_vehicles LIMIT 5;
SELECT start_location, end_location, optimal_route FROM route_optimization WHERE end_location='City A';
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE average_speed > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level = 'High' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, optimal_route FROM route_optimization WHERE distance < 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT id, vehicle_name, current_location, speed FROM autonomous_vehicles WHERE speed > 70 ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level = 'Low' AND average_speed BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT id, route_id, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City A';
SELECT route_id, congestion_level FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level > 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT vehicle_id, route_id, COUNT(*) FROM traffic_patterns GROUP BY vehicle_id, route_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT vehicles.make, traffic_patterns.timestamp FROM vehicles JOIN traffic_patterns ON vehicles.id = traffic_patterns.vehicle_id WHERE vehicles.year > 2015 ORDER BY traffic_patterns.timestamp ASC

SELECT routes.start_location, routes.end_location, AVG(congestion_level) AS avg_congestion FROM routes JOIN congestion_data ON routes.id = congestion_data.route_id GROUP BY routes.start_location, routes.end_location
SELECT routes.*, congestion_data.congestion_level FROM routes LEFT JOIN congestion_data ON routes.id = congestion_data.route_id WHERE congestion_data.congestion_level IS NULL
SELECT * FROM congestion_data;
SELECT timestamp, vehicle_id, congestion_level FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level > 3;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM route_info WHERE route_id = 2;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicle_info WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id,MAX(traffic_volume) FROM traffic_patterns GROUP BY vehicle_id ORDER BY MAX(traffic_volume) DESC;
SELECT manufacturer,model,COUNT(vehicle_id) FROM vehicle_info GROUP BY model,manufacturer ORDER BY COUNT(vehicle_id) DESC;
SELECT route_name,AVG(congestion_level) FROM route_info JOIN congestion_data ON route_info.route_id = congestion_data.route_id GROUP BY route_name ORDER BY AVG(congestion_level) ASC;
SELECT * FROM autonomous_vehicles WHERE max_speed >= 100 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC LIMIT 3;
